      • readInt

        private int readInt(java.lang.String PROMPT,
                    int MIN_VALUE,
                    int MAX_VALUE)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Prompt the user to input an integer

        Validates input against supplied parameters

        Parameters:
        PROMPT - Text prompt to display to the user
        MIN_VALUE - Minimum value accepted
        MAX_VALUE - Maximum value accepted
        Returns:
        User input
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Value input is out of range
